Text: Please Verify Your Microsoft Passport Email AddressHello Please do NOT reply to this message To contact us see the instructions below You have received this message because this is the email address you provided as your preferred email address for Microsoft Passport For your privacy and security some participating Passport sites require you to verify that this is your email address before allowing you to participate in certain activities at their sites PLEASE VERIFY THAT THIS IS YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS by clicking this link ppsecureemailaspnnlcampbelenronEcompassportEcomdtFFckebdbadacacc IF YOU HAVE RECEIVED THIS MESSAGE IN ERROR you can easily remove this email address from our records by clicking this link ppsecureemailDeleteaspfnlcampbelenronEcompassportEcomckebdbadacacc IF A LINK ABOVE DOES NOT WORK use your mouse to select the entire link starting with and going all the way to the end of the link and then copy it usually by clicking Copy in the Edit menu Open your Internet browser and click in the box where you usually see the Web page address Paste the link usually by clicking Paste in the Edit menu and then press Enter or Return on your keyboard TO CONTACT US learn about Passport get assistance and view or update your signin profile and wallet visit Passport Member Services at memberservicesasp Thank you for using your Passport The Microsoft Passport Team For more information about Passport see
